thread.section_title: Communication - Android Apps on Google Play
thread.title: Viber Messenger
thread.title_full: Viber Messenger - Android Apps on Google Play

author: A Google User
text: Nice but having problems with the connection as it seems to disconnect itself from wifi connection or 4G connection because each time I press back from my Samsung Galaxy S7 it will disconnect and drop all connections completely. When I used it on iPhone was so smooth but upgrading from iPhone 6 to Samsung Galaxy S7 changed completely because network isn't stable on the S7. I suggest to get it fixed for better review.
